tool_description: Analyzes proposed meeting times against attendee schedules and existing bookings to identify scheduling conflicts and overlaps.

proposed_start.description: Proposed meeting start time in ISO 8601 format

proposed_end.description: Proposed meeting end time in ISO 8601 format

attendee_emails.description: List of attendee email addresses to check for conflicts

room_id.description: Room identifier if checking room availability

buffer_minutes.description: Buffer time in minutes to check before and after meeting (0-60)

conflict_tolerance.description: Tolerance level for conflicts (strict, moderate, flexible)

include_tentative.description: Whether to consider tentative appointments as conflicts

priority_attendees.description: List of high-priority attendee emails whose conflicts are critical

exclude_types.description: Meeting types to exclude from conflict detection

error_messages: Invalid time range: proposed_start must be before proposed_end and both in valid ISO 8601 format.
Invalid attendee list: At least one valid email address required, maximum 100 attendees.
Invalid buffer time: buffer_minutes must be between 0 and 60.
Invalid conflict tolerance: Must be one of strict, moderate, flexible.
Calendar access failed: Unable to access calendar data for conflict detection.
Room not found: Specified room_id does not exist in the system.
Invalid timezone: Provided timezone is not recognized.
Priority attendee not found: One or more priority attendees not in main attendee list.
usage: Provide proposed meeting time and attendee list. Optional parameters include room checking, buffer time, and conflict tolerance settings. Returns detailed conflict analysis.

conflicted_attendees.description: List of attendees with scheduling conflicts

conflict_details.description: Detailed description of each conflict found

room_conflict.description: Whether the requested room has a conflict

severity_level.description: Overall conflict severity (low, medium, high, critical)

suggested_alternatives.description: Alternative time slots with fewer or no conflicts
